Title: Looks Blue, Tastes Red
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Jenji Kohan, Piper Kerman (book), Sian Heder (story editor), Lauren Morelli (story editor), Nick Jones (story editor)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Michael Harney
Plot: A job fair is being held at the prison, which Taystee attends, Red must face being alone, and Pennsatucky leaves the SHU.
